titleStmt.title: SII 5.293: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 293. (A.R. No. 5 of 1894). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE MULANATHA SHRINE AT TENKARAI NEAR SOLAVANDAN, NILAKKOTTAI TALUK, SAME DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūtalamaṭan=tai pukaḷoṭum poliya veta
mum tamiḻum melmaiyil viḷaṅka kaṟpuṭait tiru
makaḷ poṟpuyat tiruppat tikkirunāṉkuñ cakkaravāḷam
ñ cūḻum puvaṉamumeḻuṅ kavin=ta veṇkuṭainiḻaṟ ceṅ
kol naṭappa nāṭoṟu matiyamuṉ nāyaṟum valaṅ
⌈koḷa Āṭakapporuppiṉ ṉaracumi niruppa cun=taramārpiṉi
lintiraṉ pūṭṭiya Āramu malaṅkalu maḻakuṭaṉ tikaḷa vi
ḷaiyum puliyum villuñ curampuka Āṉaimaṉṉavar lar
cūṭa marapil van=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi vilakiya katiroḷi virasiṁhāsa
nattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟirun=ta ruḷiya māmutal matik
kulam viḷakkiya komutaṟ koccaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉ tribhuvanacca
kkaravattikaḻ śrīkulacekaratevar māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturaikko
yi luḷḷālai śrīvallavankūṭattup paḷḷippīṭam munai
yataraiyanil Eḻun=ta ruḷi Irun=tu yāṇṭu Oṉpatāvatu nāḷ nāṟpat
tunāliṉāl teṉakalalakanāṭṭu kulacekarapurattu śrīmūlasthāna
muṭaiyār koyilil tevarkaṉmiyum śrimāheśvarakkaṇkāṇi
ceyvāṉum cikāriyañ ceyvāṉum ceyyattiruvāymoḻin=ta
ruḷiṉapaṭi Ittevaṟkku pākaṉūrkūṟṟattuc coḻān=ta kaccaturvvedimaṅka
lattu piṭāra ceramāntoḻa ruḷḷiṭṭār kārāṇmaiyāka vilaikoṇṭu kuṭuttu
Aṉupavittu varukiṟa nilam Eḻumāvaraiyum Ittevaṟkut tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyā
kap peṟaveṇumeṉṟu maittuṉaṉār kaḷavaḻināṭāḻvār namakkuc coṉnamaiyil
Ivvūril Iṟaiyiṟukkum kolāl Innilam Eḻumāvaraiyum tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili
yāka Onpatāvatu perumpū mutaliṭṭu nam variyilār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvari taraccon
ṉom Uḷvarippaṭiyum keḻvippaṭiyum Innilam kaikkoḷkaveṉṟum Ippaṭi
kkuk kallilum cempilum veṭṭuvittukkoḷkaveṉṟum tiruvāymoḻin=taruḷi
ṉār Ivai Iṭaiyāṟṟuk karaṇikkaṅkuṭai Atirkuralcaṅkattaḻakaṉ viraṉāṉa śrīva
llava mūven=taveḷā ṉeḻuttu .. Ivai vaṭatalaiccempilanāṭṭu meṟkoṭumuḷūrāṉa
Uttamapāṇṭiyanallūrar Āyaṉ tirumuṭicūṭṭiṉāṉāṉa Uttamapāṇṭiya viḻupparaiyaṉe
ṉ Eḻuttu .. prasādañceytaruḷiṉa tirumukappaṭi koṉeriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ śrī
mūlasthāṉamuṭaiyār koyilil cikāriyam śrīvallavabrahmamārāyaṉukkum te
varkaṉmikkum śrīmāheśvarakkaṇkāṇi cevvāṉukkum Ittevaṟkup piṭāra ceramāṉ
toḻā pākaṉūrkūṟṟattu coḻān=takacaturvvetimaṅkalattu mu kārāṇmaiyā
ka vilaikoṇṭu kuṭuttu pramāṇappaṭi yaṉupavittuvarukiṟa nilam Eḻumāvaraiyum Itteva
ṟku tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyākap peṟaveṇumeṉṟu nam maccuṉaṉār kaḷavaḻināṭāḻvā
r namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil Ivvūr Iṟaiyiṟukkum kolāl Iṉṉilam Ēḻumāvarai
yum tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Oṉpatāvatu perumpū mutaliṭṭunam keḻviyum variyi
lār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum taraccoṉṉom keḻvippaṭiyum Uḷvarippaṭiyum kaikako
ṇaṭu kallilum cempilum veṭṭikkoḷka Ivai villavaṉ pallavaraiyaṉ Eḻu
ttu yāṇṭu 9 ṉāḷ 4 10 4 .
Digital edition of SII 5.293 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
